amendment.description: To reduce the amounts appropriated in divisions B and C and to rescind amounts appropriated to the Internal Revenue Service.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1347, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 74. Record Vote Number: 281.

action.text: Amendment SA 1347 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5276) To reduce the amounts appropriated in divisions B and C and to rescind amounts appropriated to the Internal Revenue Service.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1347, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 74. Record Vote Number: 281.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1347, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 23 - 74. Record Vote Number: 281.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1347 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1092.
